review_text: it's very helpful for beginner
learned lots of cool tips and tricks about motion graphics.recommended for beginners.

I Really like this Course. I've come to appreciate Phil's style.
His way of explaining makes it really easy to understand !
Everything is clear, easy to repeat and contains only necessary and useful information. I enjoyed this course a lot and it's much more than I expected. 

Strongly thanks to Philip Ebiner.

There is a typing error in question "To blue the edges of a mask, what would you do?"  in quiz of Chapter 2. May I ask you to correct it to "To blur the edges of a mask, what would you do?" because correct answer is to change value of feather mask property.

There is a wrong name of Chapter 9 in course. It is "Chapter 9: Green Screen (Chromakeying) but lessons relate to 3D animation in this chapter.

Further. When I continued the course I realised that chapter names after Chapter 9 do not correspond to lessons in it. It is probably shifted.
detailed course , I can say that I really enjoyed learning from you

`Amazing class!  Go from 0 to hero in no time!  I have already started using this to make not only my own stuff but things for customers!  Love it!  Thank you for imparting your wisdom, I can't wait to start another class! 
-Bryan
Impressive Course

The course was very well structured and it covers from basic fundamentals to complex ideas

Most importantly certain unique techniques of animation were also discussed.

Character animation,  Rotoscope ,  tracking, matte and video intro techniques discussed are very well explained  and one of the best i have ever seen.

Must watch course to improve and sharpen your command on after effects
Very detailed and helpful. Excellent for a beginner. I was able to learn so much from this with no real previous experience. Thank you so much

The Best course for all After Effect's learners. You will learn a lot from just one place. I have not enough words to say Thanks to Phill Ebiner for a clear explanation of all the basics and tools. That is a course for beginners, and after this course, you will be ready to explore After Effects further your self and create next-level animation.
Amazing course. This is a good course to learn After Effects from scratch.
Excellent course

Amazing course and nice teaching method.
Thanks 'FIVERR TEAM' for make After Effect course.

Very Nice Thanks again.!
Extremely Helpful!

The lecture is great. I have learned more thing about adobe after effect. also, I have learned about the easy way to make perfect animation. this course teaches me many imported things to video editing and after-effects. thank you

I learnt a lot from this course. I have not enough words to say Thanks to him for a clear explanation of all the basics and tools. I recommend this course for beginners, and after this course, you will be ready to explore After Effects further your self and create next-level animation. Thanks again
Thank you so much!
Learnt with fun! All lectures are to the point. Looking more advance course with Bill.
that's a good course, help me a lot :) thank you
Love this Course
Phil is great instructor! Made everything look so easy and simple to understand. Thank you for this beautiful course!
Good!
great course
Very good to start with. I missed a forum or some chat where to ask some questions I had on the way, but all good.
good course with detailed explanations
Awesome
Great experience with this course.
Very helpful
Great lesson from great lecturer, thanks Phil !
The course was great! I have 5+ years of experience in working with After Effects and even so, there were a lot a of basic things that I've learned from this! Keep it up and thank you!
Very good course.

One of the detailed course in after effects,  to strengthen your fundamentals.

Covers almost all essential  features in the after effects in a detailed manner
Perfect...i got a perfect knowledge. Great!

I am a beginner, I have used for several months premiere pro and I felt graphics and motion graphics were very difficult but by learning this course now I feel confident and get new ideas everyday! Very well covered and structured, gives you a straightforward approach to learn from easy level to something more complicated! Thanks
Very informative course for this software.  I can now expand on ideas i have for the different projects I am currently working on. Thank you for the knowledge.
I usually don't buy courses but this one was insanely beneficial, I came in with some basic knowledge already but quickly brought my self up to a high level in under 3 days.
Best course for beginners.
I have learned new things from This course. Only thing i recommend is correcting the categories. Categories are different then the chapters inside.
It's very helpful . Thank you

thankyou so much for being so informative in your classes really made my skills more strong and polished. your way of presenting and teaching was really worthy.
ill suggest you, add commercial or advertising video editing and animation in your section.
amazing course for beginners
